select e.event_no,e.tag_no ,e.event_title ,e.event_content ,e.event_date ,e.event_update ,e.status_no ,ef.event_file_no ,ef.event_file_name ,ef.event_file_extension ,ef.event_file_size from event e left join event_file ef ON e.event_no = ef.event_no WHERE (ef.event_file_type = 1 OR ef.event_file_no IS NULL)

ORDER BY event_no DESC

mapper.select: SELECT q.question_board_no ,q.member_no ,q.question_board_title ,q.question_board_date ,q.question_board_status ,q.question_board_content ,a.answer_board_no ,a.answer_board_title ,a.answer_board_date ,a.answer_board_update ,a.answer_board_content FROM question_board q LEFT JOIN answer_board a ON q.question_board_no = a.question_board_no WHERE (answer_board_no = (SELECT max(answer_board_no) from answer_board WHERE question_board_no = a.question_board_no) or answer_board_no IS NULL) AND member_no = (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{member_id}) ORDER BY question_board_no DESC
